details.author: Gambardella, Matthew
details.title: XML Developer's Guide
details.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

details.author: Ralls, Kim
details.title: Midnight Rain
details.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

details.author: Corets, Eva
details.title: The Sundered Grail
details.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.
